g2.note: G2 scraping requires Selenium + anti-bot bypass

basic_info.note: Full job scraping not implemented - placeholder

key_trends: Developer productivity tools market expanding rapidly
Remote work driving demand for workflow optimization
Integration-first approach becoming standard for B2B tools

competitive_positioning.competitive_moat: Deep integrations with developer tools and strong user experience creating switching costs
competitive_positioning.differentiation: Native Mac app with spotlight-like interface specifically designed for developer workflows
competitive_vulnerabilities: Could be replicated by larger platforms

strengths: Large and growing developer productivity market
Strong product-market fit evidenced by team growth
Defensible through deep integrations and UX

next_steps: Expand to Windows/Linux to increase TAM
Develop enterprise sales motion for larger teams
